results.content: Perfect course to introduce ES6 if you have previous experience in programming and also in Javascript
results.content_html: Perfect course to introduce ES6 if you have previous experience in programming and also in Javascript

results.content: Really helpful, simple and interesting explanation of ES6, A lot of useful tricks
results.content_html: Really helpful, simple and interesting explanation of ES6, A lot of useful tricks

results.content: I think the course is a bit fast. Sometimes I can't follow the explanations even if I review the needed episode more than once. In spite of the mentioned cons above I think it is a must see course.
results.content_html: I think the course is a bit fast. Sometimes I can't follow the explanations even if I review the needed episode more than once. In spite of the mentioned cons above I think it is a must see course.

results.content: This is an awesome course, great introduction to ES6 and great use of exercises to anchor what is being explained.  Great job.
results.content_html: This is an awesome course, great introduction to ES6 and great use of exercises to anchor what is being explained. Great job.

results.content: I'd love if it had a downloadable code structure with exercises to do there rather than in browser. JS algorithm course had that and it was great!
results.content_html: I'd love if it had a downloadable code structure with exercises to do there rather than in browser. JS algorithm course had that and it was great!

results.content: Could do better in linking to more detailed information for those who desire or require it.
results.content_html: Could do better in linking to more detailed information for those who desire or require it.
